actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the restriction that survivor compensation to any widow or widower will be terminated if such widow or widower remarries.

summary.text: Removes restrictions terminating survivor compensation to a spouse of a Federal employee who died from injuries sustained while in the performance of duties upon such spouse's remarriage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the restriction that survivor compensation to any widow or widower will be terminated if such widow or widower remarries.
